sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Strengthening Community Media Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Strengthening Community Media Act.

sections.heading: Notice of sale of a local news organization
sections.text: A local news organization shall not be sold to a company without giving written notice 120 days before the sales occurs to the following:
